comments.body: Changed the option name to `username` to better align with other modules.
Sensitive fields should have `no_log = $true` set to avoid it being accidentally displayed on the module invocation return value.

With this method we can correctly translate an account name to the Netlogon form. As well as this we also can give the user an error if the account isn't valid or resolvable for that host which would fail later on if it tried to auto logon with it.
